title: Self Assessment deadlines 2011 to 2012 tax year

details.description: Self Assessment tax return deadlines - deadlines for your tax return and paying your tax
details.body:
There are deadlines for sending your Self Assessment tax return to HM Revenue & Customs and paying any tax you owe.

For the 2011 to 2012 tax year (which ended 5 April 2012) your main deadlines are:

  • paper tax returns - by midnight 31 October 2012
  • online tax returns - by midnight 31 January 2013
  • final payment of any tax due - by midnight 31 January 2013

There are some exceptions to these deadlines.

If your tax return or payment is late you must pay a penalty.

If youâ€™ve missed the paper deadline, send your tax return online instead to avoid a penalty.
